xwikidoc.name: Documentation
xwikidoc.creator: XWiki.LudovicDubost
xwikidoc.author: XWiki.LudovicDubost
xwikidoc.content:
#** * Documentation of the Groups Section * @type content * @author ludovic *# 1 Groups Documentation #set($space = $doc.space) 1.1 Classes #set($sql = "where doc.web='${space}' and doc.content like '%@type class%' and doc.content not like '%TODO DELETE%' order by doc.name") #foreach($page in $xwiki.searchDocuments($sql)) * [$page] #end 1.1 Content pages with translations #set($sql = "where doc.web='${space}' and doc.content like '%@type content%' and doc.content not like '%TODO DELETE%' order by doc.name") #foreach($page in $xwiki.searchDocuments($sql)) * [$page] #end 1.1 Translations #set($sql = "where doc.web='${space}' and doc.content like '%@type translation%' and doc.content not like '%TODO DELETE%' order by doc.name") #foreach($page in $xwiki.searchDocuments($sql)) * [$page] #end 1.1 Sheets #set($sql = "where doc.web='${space}' and doc.content like '%@type sheet%' and doc.content not like '%TODO DELETE%' order by doc.name") #foreach($page in $xwiki.searchDocuments($sql)) * [$page] #end 1.1 Scripts #set($sql = "where doc.web='${space}' and doc.content like '%@type script%' and doc.content not like '%TODO DELETE%' order by doc.name") #foreach($page in $xwiki.searchDocuments($sql)) * [$page] #end 1.1 Services #set($sql = "where doc.web='${space}' and doc.content like '%@type ajaxservice%' and doc.content not like '%TODO DELETE%' order by doc.name") #foreach($page in $xwiki.searchDocuments($sql)) * [$page] #end 1.1 Templates #set($sql = "where doc.web='${space}' and doc.content like '%@type template%' and doc.content not like '%TODO DELETE%' order by doc.name") #foreach($page in $xwiki.searchDocuments($sql)) * [$page] #end 1.1 Mail Templates #set($sql = "where doc.web='${space}' and doc.content like '%@type mailtemplate%' and doc.content not like '%TODO DELETE%' order by doc.name") #foreach($page in $xwiki.searchDocuments($sql)) * [$page] #end 1.1 Pages with no type #set($sql = "where doc.web='${space}' and doc.content not like '%@type%' and doc.content not like '%TODO DELETE%' order by doc.name") #foreach($page in $xwiki.searchDocuments($sql)) * [$page] #end 1.1 Pages to delete #set($sql = "where doc.web='${space}' and doc.content like '%TODO DELETE%' order by doc.name") #foreach($page in $xwiki.searchDocuments($sql)) * [$page] #end 1.1 All #set($sql = "where doc.web='${space}'") #foreach($page in $xwiki.searchDocuments($sql))
$page #end
